snippet: Kindred’s offer to buy Gentiva Health Services for about $514 million in cash and stock sets up a potential battle over the health care services company.
abstract: Kindred’s offer to buy Gentiva Health Services for about $514 million in cash and stock sets up a potential battle over the health care services company.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Kindred Healthcare Makes Unsolicited Bid for Gentiva
